Title: System for Marking Attendance
Features: Face Detection: Detects faces in real-time using OpenCV and Dlib libraries.
Face Recognition: Recognizes faces based on pre-trained models and stored data.
Attendance Marking: Automatically marks attendance when a recognized face is detected.
Database Management: Stores and manages attendance data in a MySQL database.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive interface for easy interaction and management.
Real-Time Updates: Provides real-time updates on attendance status and reports.

Voice Control: Use voice commands to control smart devices and systems for hands-free operation.
Real-Time Monitoring: Receive alerts and notifications for security breaches, energy usage, and system status.
